content: embrace the magic of the **sazerac cable sweater** by marly bird a harmonious dance of cables and seed stitch creates a fabric rich in texture yet remarkably lightweight designed to be your cozy companion it promises to be both a delightful knit and a chic wardrobe staple whether you re a novice exploring cables for the first time or a seasoned knitter seeking simplicity with a twist this pattern offers an enriching experience join the journey stitch by stitch and let the **sazerac** enchant you this pattern is part of the marly bird first fall make-along 1 there is a vip upgrade available in the marlybirdhouse com included in vip * ad-free pdf of the full pattern * step-by-step video tutorials * preventing and fixing mistakes video tutorials * weekly live q & a with marly bird * ⭐️ $10 coupon ⭐️ for the marly bird ravelry store * ⭐️ bonus ⭐️ comfort cable blanket pattern + more become a vip make-along member by visiting https //marlybirdfirstfall com/ 2 **skill level**
